title: Best foundation for oily skin 2019 to combat shine that are super long wearing
text:

Fake a flawless complexion with brightening, smoothing and blurring bases that are ideal if your face gets oily.

From budget brands to designer loves, there are plenty of fabulous foundation bases nowadays with oil-free formulas to combat oily and combination skin types - and they give you a long-lasting finish.

But with so many foundations on the market, how do you know exactly which one will work for your skin – and last you all night?

Read our list of top rated products below find your perfect match.

Best foundations for oily skin

1. The Ordinary Coverage Foundation

This oil-free foundation is such a bargain. The Ordinary formula contains SPF15 so works as an everyday base and the lightweight serum texture won't clog your pores and result in a cakey finish.

Price: £5.70, Look fantastic - buy here now

2. Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Foundation

Packed full of kind to skin ingredients, not only does this premium foundation blend hydrate and replenish the skin; it also leaves you with a striking matte finish without looking dry. Where has this been all of our lives?

Find the perfect shade for you with over 40 shades to choose from, we can;t help but love the opaque and rose gold glass bottle either.

Price: £34, Cult beauty - buy here now

3. Laura Mercier Silk Creme Oil Free Photo Edition Foundation

Laura Mercier products have long been a beauty insider favourite, and this oil-free foundation is no exception.

The long-wearing formula (it lasts up to 12 hours) gives a matte finish so you won't have to worry about unnecessary shine and it's long wearing,

At £36 it's one of the pricier bottles on the market, but with this premium formula a little goes a long way.

Price: £36, Look fantastic - buy here now

4. Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation

This is a great low-cost foundation made with micro-powders that help to absorb shine in oily skin types.

With over 35 shades to choose from, there's truly a shade for everyone. At under a fiver you can't really go wrong.

Price: £4.24, Amazon - buy here now

5. MAC Studio Fix Fluid

This popular MAC foundation comes in a full shade range and the oil free formula means it is great if you're prone to looking greasy.

The lightweight, medium to full coverage is easy to build and won't leave pores clogged or blocked.

Teamed with great setting spray, you're good to go shine-free all day long.

Price: £22.95, John Lewis - buy here now

6. Too Faced Born This Way Super Coverage Concealer

Although Too Faced Born this Way is a concealer, the super coverage allows it multi uses - you are perfectly okay to use this as a liquid foundation.

The concealer is oil free and packed full of pigments that give you a flawless finish using little product - avoiding the 'caked' look.

You can expect your flawless look to last you the best part of 12 hours, it's a yes from us.

Price: £24, Look fantastic - buy here now

7. Revlon ColorStay Foundation For Combination Skin

This foundation is ideal if you need a formula that reduces the oil production on your T-zone but won’t dry out the rest of your face.

This Revlon foundation has a soft matte finish, and is a good option for those prone to a touch of midday shine.

It's also humidity and sweat resistant making it perfect to wear on sunny days, even if your pits are sweaty your pores won't be.

Price: £4.55, Amazon - buy here now

8. Clinique Stay-Matte Oil-Free Makeup

Another great one if you have combination skin as it controls oil breakthrough that can happen after a few hours of wear.

The gel cream texture also helps keep the drier areas of your face hydrated too.

This is a premium formula foundation that will be long wearing at work and through your evening out.

Price: £26, Clinique - buy here now

9. NYX Professional Makeup Stay Matte But Not Flat Liquid Foundation

The mineral enriched foundation offers full coverage and the water-based formula helps combat unwanted shine and cover blemishes seamlessly.

At £7 it's definitely one to keep in the makeup bag, even if it isn't your everyday foundation.

Price: £7, Cult beauty - buy here now

10. BareMinerals Original Foundation

The powder formula of this foundation buffs onto the skin easily giving you a nice silky finish.

It's also great for absorbing additional oil and moisture on oily-prone skin without looking clumpy or cakey.

Whether you just want to be sheen free at the office, or you're hitting the town later - you can rely on this foundation with little to no touchups.

Price: £28, Look fantastic - buy here now
